name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2000
overview: Be the Next Tiger. Be the Next Legend - Play on the course as Tiger Woods or any of five other PGA TOUR pros Tour the Finest - Select from five exclusive PGA TOUR courses including Poppy Hills Golf Course. TPC at Sawgrass. TPC at Summerlin. Badlands Golf Club, and TPC at The Canyons Unprecedented Analog Swing Control - Fade, draw, or angle your shot for the best approach Tour Mode - Five tournaments on five different courses A Game For Every Golfer - Eight game modes including Tournament, Stroke play, The Skins Game & more
